subtitle: Hello and welcome to Astral Doorway - a place to journey within yourself and awaken
into the very edge of time and space that lie in the depths of consciousness... how do we go to those
depths of consciousness? Isn't everything we see already part of consciousness?... The real question
is, how do I discern what I'm perceiving is consciousness, or from my own self-creation?
well one needs a finely tuned sort of awareness to see
what is really going on inside our skulls right? The way to start actually getting a grip
and familiarity with this type of critical awareness is to rise above time, to go beyond time
what do we mean by that and how do we do it? one cannot possibly know what time truly is
until they're fully aware of it and how it impacts their own personal life
you can understand it theoretically, sure, but even that theory exists as a memory
in the past when you read about it, as just a form of stored knowledge, so with any far and long
journey, like going beyond time, or reaching the astral plane we don't undertake those journeys by
looking far away, no, in order to go far we have to begin with what is near
so every journey always begins with the here and now, our physical life and our perception of it
if you're stuck in time, you cannot truly see it for what it is
and guess what? if one is stuck in time and deeply lost in it and identified with it
then that person is in essence blocking themselves from intuiting the reality of the astral plane
I know that's a mouthful but let me attempt to clarify all of this and what I mean
just before i do i want to give a quick shout out to 7 new Patreons: Ryan, Sage, Maximilian
Rochelle, Matt, JK and Michael - thank you all for joining and supporting this channel I deeply
appreciate it, and also thank you to John Borman and Karen for increasing their pledges
it really means a lot, if you'd like to join and support Astral Doorway there's a link in
the description below, okay so like I said we get stuck in time - I am in no way saying
time is bad, no, time is what is right? how can you deny what is? but what i am saying
is that instead of gracefully living in acceptance of what is, we instead often put our hands out
and grab time and rub it in our eyes and taint our vision, and our perception, we no longer live
in our normal current time here and now in the present moment but we live in those
moments in time where we attached ourselves to certain experiences of the past and we also do
the same with worrying or trying to imagine what the future will be - we're so obsessed with time
and we don't even realize it... so let's get a little more scientific to understand this even more
the Astral plane is the 5th dimension, and time is the 4th dimension - everyone familiar with
science and physics knows that time is the 4th dimension okay? the 1st dimension
is length the 2nd dimension gives width to that length okay? and the 3rd dimension
gives height to that width and length which in turn creates space to move around and explore
you see? this is where we are materially right? exploring three-dimensional space, so now we have
space the 3rd dimension - now there's the deeper aspect the 4th dimension which gives time
to this space in order to experience the 3rd dimension in an understandable and linear way
so if you were to imagine yourself in the 4th dimension you would see multiple
versions of yourself starting from when you were a baby to where you are now listening to this
the thing is because we're stuck at a level of consciousness of the 3rd and 4th dimension
we only think we're one version of ourselves - if you were truly risen above the 4th dimension
you would clearly see your life and comprehend every aspect of your life multidimensionally
as different versions of yourself but we don't see that, why? because we're stuck in time
and identified with it, we tell ourselves, "something that happened in the past conditions who i
am today - i am my past"... of course that's not correct right? we are who we are right now
now i hope you can see where we're going with the 5th dimension, the 5th dimension is above
time and space okay? the 5th dimension allows time and space to exist and be experienced
but not only one timeline of your life
but infinite timelines and possibilities of realities - that is what the 5th dimension holds
that is what the Astral plane holds, or a core aspect of the Astral plane... and think about
that word timeline right? time-line the 4th dimension is multidimensional - it has a multiple
timelines which are clearly accessible from the perspective of the 5th dimension
so for example from right now where you are in this point in your life
where will you go? what will you experience? do you think you'll know what you'll experience?
maybe you think you have no choice about what your future holds because you believe
life is a certain way for you, therefore you will experience life according to the way you
believe it will because you're so stuck in the dimension of time that you can't see there's
other possibilities and realities and timelines for you to connect to, because you're so attached
to your current timeline in the way that you think it is in the way that you think it conditions you
if you were risen above this above time
and clearly saw your experience of time and space as it is
rather than what you think it is, then you would be connecting to the 5th dimension that is within
yourself and have much better clarity in order to see your own possibilities and your own potential
so the Astral plane, the 5th dimension is like its own special
space or bubble that surrounds all of time and space, the 5th dimension is like
the womb of a mother, and the mother allows all kinds of time and space to occur, and she doesn't
care what happens because like a true mother she just wants you to be happy and experience
what's best for you, you have that freedom, so if you choose to experience a space
where you are struggling and having an extremely difficult time, then she will let you do that
that's what love is right? this is just one way you can start to understand the
archetype of the divine mother, the expression of the ancient egyptian 'Nut' would be a great
example here, take a look at this picture of her and how she covers the world with her body
and we can look to that feminine aspect to disconnect ourselves with unwanted realities
and we can in a way ask that aspect to help us to go beyond all of this and understand deeper
realities such as the Astral plane, so this is the natural power the 5th dimension has over time
the thing is we're so unconscious that we make unconscious decisions 5th dimensionally and
experience things we don't necessarily want to, however if you weren't so unconscious and we
actualize the reality of the 5th dimension practically, then we would have the freedom
to choose what and how we begin to experience our given time and space, take a look at this
infograph i made this week, you might not be able to read it if you're on a small screen
if not i'll leave a link below in the description so you can download it so you can zoom in and see
now in the center is your awareness ,untainted pure, permanent, without ego, without judgments
it is in essence your soul - that which journeys beyond the body and stays with you after death
now i want you to imagine this ball as an enormous powerful sun with heat, fire
life and potential because this is what our soul truly feels like right? forget petty and weak
theories about what you THINK the soul is - imagine it as this beaming orb of pure light and love
now imagine it being born into this 3rd dimension in the form of a human being
and thus it begins to travel through the 4th dimension of time throughout its life, and it does
so quite happily at first enjoying its experience as it grows older, but then "oh no" what's this?
the orb isn't traveling so smoothly anymore - there's turbulence, the orb is
resisting what is happening in its experience, it's struggling to continue living smoothly,
it's having such a hard time with a specific experience that it gave some of its light to
a thought or dream or identification about that experience that caused it
pain and the orb keeps struggling and struggling with different experiences at
points in time until it turns into just a little ball of light and around it it now has all this
discolorations, polluted light, floating around it you can barely see the pure orb of light anymore
because all of its garbage, identifications, sadness anger, desires, unhappiness and all these things are
justified by the illusion that it identifies with time and that it takes time personally
and so all the offshoots all the branches you see on the image are just a few generalized examples
of things we get lost in due to the experiences of time, am i saying these things are inherently bad?
no, i'm saying that we get lost and obsessed and identified with them, we think we are them
we are so lost in them that we cannot even see them, we're not even aware of them, we're
not observing them, we're not seeing them for what they are as just simply thought-form structures
within the space of our consciousness that are blocking our own clarity on our spiritual path, on
our natural way of seeing, and all these things are accumulated from our past
you are not your past - why should what you have experienced in your past affect you now?
here and now you have the opportunity to do whatever you want in the future, should that be
conditioned by the past? no, of course not, that's ridiculous, but it's true for most of us because
throughout the time of our lives we fight, cry worry and stress over what has already happened,
and what has already happened has happened - it does not exist anymore in your current space time
experience, so where do all of our problems exist? it exists in your own mind in the form of dreams
worries, fears and other nonsensical thought-form structures in the trap of our imagination
i'm not saying imagination is bad, i'm just saying that it controls us and traps us
in this way because we have no control over it, so let go of all that, just do it
you don't need to ask how, you don't need to be confused about it, you just let it go - they have
no purpose or relevance to your current life situation here and now, the only purpose they hold
for you is to wake up out of them and realize that you've been carrying them around as delusion, and
what happens when you accumulate so many thoughts emotions and opinions about your past and future?
you fill your inner space with self-created dreams, and how can new experiences arise if you are not
empty? if you are always telling the same story over and over to yourself to other people,
Googling the same problems... you have to be empty from moment to moment in order to touch the
eternal realm within yourself to go beyond time, so we don't just experience our one personal timeline
no, imagine the entire timeline of your life now, do you think it's just one timeline? no
in our unconscious and defective mind we make up all sorts of realities about the one
timeline we experience, we taint it and we do this because we're multidimensional in nature but
we don't use this multi-dimensionality in a positive way, we use it in a negative fragmented
way and create endless dreams and delusions about our life experiences and we don't even think that
these are negative, we love them, we personalize them, we hold on to them, we use them for arguments
and we use them to engage in arguments with others, and all this of course we dream about at night too
stuck in these delusions of thoughts and attachments, think about a time in your life
that was very difficult, now the more anxiety you have about that experience you may have one, two
three, four, ten different types of thoughts about that experience for example you might say "oh i
liked that experience" but another part of you might say "oh actually i hated that experience
or an angry part of you might say "oh i wish i could go to that experience and
fight with that person who was there saying things about me" or a shy aspect of you might say "oh
i really wish i could be a bit more confident" or a sadder aspect of you might say "oh i really feel
sorry for that person this was such a terrible experience" - there's all sorts of nonsense in our
mind that we get hypnotized into these past experiences and we replay them as a sort of
on-going cinema within our minds, and there is an endless duality here in our nature
and how we treat our experiences - why do we have the need to interpret and opinionate everything?
leaving things as they are is far more intelligent and less ignorant than having the compulsive
need to make sense of things, so what's one of the biggest things to take from this?
being fully here, NOW, fully occupied, fully presence, fully attending to our mind
and our awareness it doesn't even take effort, why should it take effort to just see
see what's going on around you? it can feel like it takes effort if you don't like what you see
but is that really seeing? is that really looking within? no because if you don't "like" what you're
seeing, you're simply adding to these dreams and opinions about what's happening in your experience
get to a point where there is no more observer and no more observed, get to a
point where you only see things as 'what-is', without judgements, without labeling, right?
when you go into nature don't see a bush, a tree, an insect, don't see ideas in your mind
just see, and you can do this with seeing the way you think, and what you think, and why you think
the way you do - this is the critical dimension of insight that we as a species need to venture into,
as i said in a previous episode - there are no teachers in the world who can teach you - you your
'self' and your relationship with others in the world is the only teacher - the only guru who can
aid you, and this silent teacher is the only way for you to make any sort of progression into that
which is far, that which is beyond what we call normal and ordinary - so no more endless theories
and discussions, interchange of ideas, judgments no more thinking about oneself right? because
remember there is a huge difference between thinking about oneself and observing oneself
change comes from within, with objective awareness, objective observation with deep self
enquiry in the silence of the mind, you have to realize that there is an infinitely
more deeper intelligence to profound inner silence than the use of personalized
intellectualizations, analyzations and judgments silence is far more intelligent and wiser
okay well that's all for today, wishing you clarity and clear inner light in this time
of the zodiac sign Leo which is to do with the energies of the sun and our hearts and is a
great time to practice meditation, it's also the week of my birthday so sorry if i don't
get back to your many questions this week i'll be out here in south korea celebrating, nobody
should ever listen to the pessimistic people who say they don't care about their birthdays they
don't care because they don't care about life right? a birthday is a time to review your
life where you've been where you're going and to celebrate another year alive in the precious gift
that is life, also there is so much more to be said about the dimensions from the 1st
all the way up to the 9th or 11th dimensions of nature and i'm planning to make a much more
in-depth series about each one, so look out for that in the future, be sure to be subscribed
share this video with like minds, and I'll see you in that which is beyond time,
the eternal realm of the present moment, where all higher dimensions exist - not just the Astral~ üôè
